languages.text: Некоторое время спустя Ирлиэт приходит к Лорд-капитану — изможденная, но все еще цепляющаяся за надежду. Она говорит о том, что отправилась на судне мон-кай во тьму в надежде отыскать собратьев. И о том, как нашла лишь трупы, погребенные человеческой ненавистью. И все же эльдарка знает, что Лорд-капитан изо всех сил старал{mf|ся|ась} сдержать данное обещание. А Ирлиэт поступки говорят громче любых речей. В благодарность, как и обещала, она делится координатами схрона своих собратьев.

Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard but hopeful. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. And yet the Aeldari knows that the Lord Captain made every possible effort to uphold {mf|his|her} promise. For Yrliet, actions speak louder than any word. In gratitude, as she promised, she shares the coordinates of her kin's cache.
languages.original_text: Некоторое время спустя Ирлиэт приходит к Лорд-капитану — изможденная, но все еще цепляющаяся за надежду. Она говорит о том, что отправилась на судне мон-кай во тьму в надежде отыскать собратьев. И о том, как нашла лишь трупы, погребенные человеческой ненавистью. И все же эльдарка знает, что Лорд-капитан изо всех сил старал{mf|ся|ась} сдержать данное обещание. А Ирлиэт поступки говорят громче любых речей. Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard but hopeful. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. And yet the Aeldari knows that the Lord Captain made every possible effort to uphold {mf|his|her} promise. For Yrliet, actions speak louder than any word. In gratitude, as she promised, she shares the coordinates of her kin's cache.

languages.text: 过了一段时间之后，伊莉耶特回到了领主舰长身边，看起来憔悴但充满希望。她说，她登上了这艘猴子的舰船，驶入黑暗，就是希望能找到她的族人，但她所找到的一切，却只有族人的尸体，死在满怀恨意的人类手中。然而她知道，领主舰长已经尽了一切努力来履行{mf|他的|她的}诺言。对伊莉耶特而言，行动比语言更有说服力。为了表示感谢，伊莉耶特遵守了承诺，分享了她的族人藏宝处的坐标。
languages.original_text: Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard but hopeful. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. And yet the Aeldari knows that the Lord Captain made every possible effort to uphold {mf|his|her} promise. For Yrliet, actions speak louder than any word. In gratitude, as she promised, she shares the coordinates of her kin's cache.

traits.locale_text: 过了一段时间之后，伊莉耶特回到了领主舰长身边，看起来憔悴但充满希望。她说，她登上了这艘猴子的舰船，驶入黑暗，就是希望能找到她的族人，但她所找到的一切，却只有族人的尸体，死在满怀恨意的人类手中。然而她知道，领主舰长已经尽了一切努力来履行{mf|他的|她的}诺言。对伊莉耶特而言，行动比语言更有说服力。为了表示感谢，伊莉耶特遵守了承诺，分享了她的族人藏宝处的坐标。

languages.text: それからしばらくして、ユリエットが、やつれながらも希望を抱いている様子でロード・キャプテンのもとを訪れた。彼女はモン＝ケイの船に乗り込み、キンを見つけようと暗闇の中へと旅立ったが、見つけたのは人類の憎しみによって虐殺された死体だけだったと言う。だがアエルダリは、ロード・キャプテンが{mf|彼|彼女}との約束を守るため、あらゆる努力をしたことを知っている。ユリエットは言葉より行動を重視する。感謝の気持ちを込めて、彼女は約束通り、キンの隠し場所の座標を教える。
languages.original_text: Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard but hopeful. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. And yet the Aeldari knows that the Lord Captain made every possible effort to uphold {mf|his|her} promise. For Yrliet, actions speak louder than any word. In gratitude, as she promised, she shares the coordinates of her kin's cache.

traits.locale_text: それからしばらくして、ユリエットが、やつれながらも希望を抱いている様子でロード・キャプテンのもとを訪れた。彼女はモン＝ケイの船に乗り込み、キンを見つけようと暗闇の中へと旅立ったが、見つけたのは人類の憎しみによって虐殺された死体だけだったと言う。だがアエルダリは、ロード・キャプテンが{mf|彼|彼女}との約束を守るため、あらゆる努力をしたことを知っている。ユリエットは言葉より行動を重視する。感謝の気持ちを込めて、彼女は約束通り、キンの隠し場所の座標を教える。

languages.text: Poco después, Yrliet se presenta ante {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, demacrada pero esperanzada. Dice que subió a bordo de la nave mon-keigh y se adentró en la oscuridad con la esperanza de encontrar a sus parientes, pero que solo encontró cadáveres masacrados por el odio de la Humanidad. Sin embargo, la Aeldari sabe que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán hizo todo lo posible por cumplir su promesa. Para Yrliet, las acciones hablan más alto que cualquier palabra. En agradecimiento, como prometió, comparte las coordenadas del escondite de su familia.
languages.original_text: Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard but hopeful. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. And yet the Aeldari knows that the Lord Captain made every possible effort to uphold {mf|his|her} promise. For Yrliet, actions speak louder than any word. In gratitude, as she promised, she shares the coordinates of her kin's cache.

traits.locale_text: Poco después, Yrliet se presenta ante {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, demacrada pero esperanzada. Dice que subió a bordo de la nave mon-keigh y se adentró en la oscuridad con la esperanza de encontrar a sus parientes, pero que solo encontró cadáveres masacrados por el odio de la Humanidad. Sin embargo, la Aeldari sabe que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán hizo todo lo posible por cumplir su promesa. Para Yrliet, las acciones hablan más alto que cualquier palabra. En agradecimiento, como prometió, comparte las coordenadas del escondite de su familia.

languages.text: Einige Zeit später kommt Yrliet zum Lord Captain, verstört, aber hoffnungsvoll. Sie sagt, sie sei an Bord des Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiffs gekommen und in die Dunkelheit ausgezogen, um ihre Verwandten zu finden, habe aber nur Leichen gefunden, vom Hass der Menschheit abgeschlachtet. Und doch weiß die Aeldari, dass der Lord Captain alles getan hat, um sein Versprechen einzuhalten. Für Yrliet sagen Taten mehr als tausend Worte. Dankbar nennt sie dem Lord Captain wie versprochen die Koordinaten des Verstecks ihres Volks.
languages.original_text: Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard but hopeful. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. And yet the Aeldari knows that the Lord Captain made every possible effort to uphold {mf|his|her} promise. For Yrliet, actions speak louder than any word. In gratitude, as she promised, she shares the coordinates of her kin's cache.

traits.locale_text: Einige Zeit später kommt Yrliet zum Lord Captain, verstört, aber hoffnungsvoll. Sie sagt, sie sei an Bord des Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiffs gekommen und in die Dunkelheit ausgezogen, um ihre Verwandten zu finden, habe aber nur Leichen gefunden, vom Hass der Menschheit abgeschlachtet. Und doch weiß die Aeldari, dass der Lord Captain alles getan hat, um sein Versprechen einzuhalten. Für Yrliet sagen Taten mehr als tausend Worte. Dankbar nennt sie dem Lord Captain wie versprochen die Koordinaten des Verstecks ihres Volks.

languages.text: Un peu plus tard, Yrliet vient voir {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneur-capitaine}, l'air hagard et néanmoins optimiste. Elle lui dit qu'elle s'est embarquée à son bord pour explorer les ténèbres dans l'espoir de renouer avec les siens, mais qu'en fin de compte, elle n'a trouvé qu'un monceau de cadavres sacrifiés sur l'autel de la haine de l'humanité. Pour autant, l'Aeldari a bien conscience des efforts déployés par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour honorer sa promesse. Or, aux yeux d'Yrliet, les actes valent bien plus que les mots, et en gage de reconnaissance, elle lui communique les coordonnées de la cachette de son peuple.
languages.original_text: Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard but hopeful. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. And yet the Aeldari knows that the Lord Captain made every possible effort to uphold {mf|his|her} promise. For Yrliet, actions speak louder than any word. In gratitude, as she promised, she shares the coordinates of her kin's cache.

traits.locale_text: Un peu plus tard, Yrliet vient voir {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneur-capitaine}, l'air hagard et néanmoins optimiste. Elle lui dit qu'elle s'est embarquée à son bord pour explorer les ténèbres dans l'espoir de renouer avec les siens, mais qu'en fin de compte, elle n'a trouvé qu'un monceau de cadavres sacrifiés sur l'autel de la haine de l'humanité. Pour autant, l'Aeldari a bien conscience des efforts déployés par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour honorer sa promesse. Or, aux yeux d'Yrliet, les actes valent bien plus que les mots, et en gage de reconnaissance, elle lui communique les coordonnées de la cachette de son peuple.

languages.text: Yrliet, bir süre sonra bezgin ama hâlâ umutlu bir hâlde Lord Kaptan'ın yanına geliyor. Soydaşlarını bulma umuduyla bu mon-keigh gemisine binmiş ama sadece İnsanlığın nefretle katlettiği cesetler bulmuş diye anlatıyor. Yine de Yrliet, Lord Kaptan'ın verdiği sözü tutmak için elinden geleni yaptığının farkında. Yrliet lafa değil, işe bakar. Söz verdiği gibi soydaşlarının zulasının koordinatlarını minnetle paylaşıyor.
languages.original_text: Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard but hopeful. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. And yet the Aeldari knows that the Lord Captain made every possible effort to uphold {mf|his|her} promise. For Yrliet, actions speak louder than any word. In gratitude, as she promised, she shares the coordinates of her kin's cache.
